item.title: Diffusion Models: From VAEs to DDPM Derivation
item.description: A comprehensive breakdown of Diffusion Models, starting from the limitations of Hierarchical VAEs, covering the thermodynamics inspiration, and detailing the full mathematical derivation of the ELBO and the simplified noise-prediction loss used in DDPM. This post is based on a presentation I gave at a YBIGTA (Big data society in Yonsei) session.
